scripts.serve3: source ../env/bin/activate && cd backend/iluminare && python manage.py runserver
scripts.serve4: source ../env/bin/activate && cd src/ && python manage.py runserver 8080
scripts.build: browserify app/scripts/iluminare.js -t [ babelify --blacklist regenerator ] -t [envify --NODE_ENV production] | uglifyjs -cm > app/scripts/bundle.min.js
